item.title: First testing Blog
item.description: Why writers should use Markdown Markdown is quick, simple and portable. It’s also extremely elegant and very cool. You need to know Markdown. WYSIWYGs are the past. They’re slow and bloated. This is a subheading This makes a blockquote. A blockquote is a long piece of of quoted text. Blockquotes are often indented and occasionally italicised.
